title: Ghost

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Control a target, forcing them to visit a new target of your choice. You learn their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On night 3 you fade away. It is essentially the exact same as dying, but you don't fulfill your Destiny, and it doesn't trigger "on-death" effects. The town is told you faded away and did not die at the start of the day.
- You appear innocent.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Die before night 3 starts by any means.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4326
*The apprentice necromancer recited the last words of her ritual. A devious grin spread across her face as the cadaver began to rise. It stumbled, then slowly opened its eyes.*
*The necromancer opened her mouth to speak to her creation, but the misty corpse began to scream and shriek. "I am fading away! RETURN ME!", it cried out.*
